極大魔法でも　ダメなのか。
google_translated:
Come!
Whether he is no longer a great magic?

en_text: What?
jp_text:
（アル・サーメン）何!?

What!?

en_text: I see.

en_text: When you use the same type of magic at the same time, it becomes more powerful.

Magic is the same line

それと同じことを…。
